name: Change the World: Dream
description:
Change the World: DreamAbout

This game is a retro, challenging, top-down shooter with a long story to discover.

Alone, lost in an unknown world, going through forests, deserts, caves... Everywhere, you are surrounded by Corrupted Monsters.
How did you get here? What happend? You don't know.

Don't let them get you. Feel The Power of Determination.

Is this even real? 

The game contains
  • Character creator with 3 difficulties, Hard Mode switch, 6 weapons and 5 items
  • 5 Locations, each containing 3-5 levels
  • 5 different enemies and a boss battle
  • 2 endings

Current version is Public Playable Prototype so there is a lot to be done.
By supporting me on my dev streams on Twitch, you will speed up the development and becoming a patron on my Patreon will give you access to exclusive content and polls.

If you will find any bugs, please report it in the comments or in best case on my Discord server in channel #ctwd-bug-reports.
